thread.title: One mom 'paid the ultimate price' when her child died of whooping cough. She wants to spare others
thread.title_full: One mom 'paid the ultimate price' when her child died of whooping cough. She wants to spare others

title: One mom 'paid the ultimate price' when her child died of whooping cough. She wants to spare others
text:
One mom 'paid the ultimate price' when her child died of whooping cough. She wants to spare others Jun 28, 2025 Jun 28, 2025 Updated Jul 15, 2025 0 Devastating infectious diseases ran rampant in America, killing millions of children and leaving others with lifelong health problems. These illnesses were the main reason why nearly one in five children in 1900 never made it to their fifth birthday. As featured on Forever changed by diseases that vaccines can prevent, families share their stories Before the vaccines, such illnesses were the main reason why nearly one in five children in 1900 never made it to their fifth birthday. Latest video Facebook Twitter Bluesky WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save 0 Comments
